  33. ‌let add_path dir =
  34.   Load_path.add_dir dir;
  35.   Envaux.reset_cache()

  37. ‌let add_path_for mdl dir =
  38.   let old = try Hashtbl.find load_path_for mdl with Not_found -> [] in
  39.   Hashtbl.replace load_path_for mdl (dir :: old)
